description: Enjoy computing with superior energy-efficiency and performance with the ZOTAC ZBOX ID41 mini-PC powered by the class-leading Next-Generation NVIDIA ION and Intel Atom architectures. Next-Generation NVIDIA ION graphics deliver unrivaled levels of performance and high definition video decode capabilities to the ZOTAC ZBOX ID41mini-PC with NVIDIA CUDA, PureVideo HD and HDMI 1.3a technologies for computing with premium audio and video capabilities. High performance computing is only two thumb screws away with the ZOTACZBOX ID41 mini-PC thanks to a user friendly design that makes mastering the mini-PC quickened easy. Space for a 2.5-inch hard drive and 2 204-pin DDR3-800 DIMM slot enables users to customize the internals of the ZOTAC ZBOX ID40 to their own needs while USB 3.0 and USB 2.0ports, a 6-in-1 memory card reader (SD/SDHC/MS/MS Pro/xD/MMC) and eSATA port provide greater external expansion capabilities for perfect computing.
title: ZOTAC ZBOX Intel Atom D525 1.8 GHz Dual Core Barebone Mini-PC ZBOX-ID41-U
